description:
Tsuda Kotomi is Takatoshi`s younger sister, who ultimately ends up attending Ousai the next year. A cheerful girl, she is considerate and caring toward others, but is curious and enthusiastic about sexual matters. In one episode, she and Shino both bring Takatoshi adult manga when he was sick. She is very close with her brother, but her comments sometimes imply they have an incestuous relationship, often to Takatoshi`s frustration. Nonetheless, she gets along very well with the other girls and is always asking and getting help constantly from them.
Source: Wiki
name: Tsuda Kotomi
